thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Glycomimetics Enters Agreement With Hovon To Initiate Study Startup Activities For Planned Clinical Trial Of GMI-1271 And Decitabine

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Glycomimetics Enters Agreement With Hovon To Initiate Study Startup Activities For Planned Clinical Trial Of GMI-1271 And Decitabine
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Glycomimetics Inc:
* GLYCOMIMETICS ENTERS INTO AGREEMENT WITH HOVON TO INITIATE STUDY STARTUP ACTIVITIES FOR PLANNED CLINICAL TRIAL OF GMI-1271 AND DECITABINE IN PATIENTS WITH NEWLY DIAGNOSED ACUTE MYELOID LEUKEMIA (AML) WHO ARE UNFIT FOR CHEMOTHERAPY
* GLYCOMIMETICS INC - ‍ON TRACK TO DISCLOSE DETAILS FOR DESIGN OF PHASE 3 TRIAL IN RELAPSED/REFRACTORY AML PATIENTS DURING 2017 YEAR-END EARNINGS CALL
* GLYCOMIMETICS INC - ‍ HOVON INTENDS TO ENROLL APPROXIMATELY 140 PATIENTS IN CLINICAL TRIAL OF GMI-1271 AND DECITABINE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
